hymn.title: For God so loved the world

layout.singingstanza: For God so loved the world that He gave His on -- ly be -- got -- ten Son, that ev -- ery -- one who be -- lieves in -- to Him would not per -- ish. For not per -- ish, but would have e -- ter -- nal life. O how I a -- dore my Lord, for He has died for me. O how I a -- dore my Lord, for He has giv -- en life to me. For God so loved the world that He gave His on -- ly be -- got -- ten Son, that ev -- ery -- one who be -- lieves in -- to Him would not per -- ish, but would have e -- ter -- nal life.

lyrics.stanza: For God so loved the world That He gave His only begotten Son, That everyone who believes into Him Would not perish.
For God so loved the world That He gave His only begotten Son, That everyone who believes into Him Would not perish, But would have eternal life.
O how I adore my Lord, For He has died for me. O how I adore my Lord, For He has given life to me.
For God so loved the world That He gave His only begotten Son, That everyone who believes into Him Would not perish, But would have eternal life.
